other_tests.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis at lung bases, without consolidation or pleural effusion. Multiple small hepatic hypodensities suggesting simple cysts. Right-sided diverticulosis noted with marked bowel wall thickening of the cecum, associated pericecal fat stranding, and an inflamed cecal diverticulum with mucosal hyperenhancement. Small amount of fluid in the right paracolic gutter. Normal appendix and scattered diverticulosis in the colon. Small amount of free fluid in the pelvis. No worrisome bony lesions.
